sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { select, Store } from '@ngrx/store'; import { invokeInventoryAPI } from '../store/inventory.action'; import { selectInventory } from '../store/inventory.selector'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { parts$ = this.store.pipe(select(selectInventory)); numOfParts: number; constructor(private store: Store) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.store.dispatch(invokeInventoryAPI()); console.log(this.parts$); this.parts$.subscribe((data) => { this.numOfParts = data.length; console.log(this.numOfParts) }) } }

Edit part
  • PartNumber: {{part?.partNumber}}
  • Cost: {{part?.cost}}
  • In-stock: {{part?.inStock}}
  • Description: {{part?.description}}
